the nation’s wounds

The president showed some passion and did what he needed to do in his second debate with Mitt Romney.

Suicide is not health care, and prescribing death is not a doctor’s role.

The inaugural Food Allergy Conference for Restaurateurs highlighted the prevalence and variety of food allergies for food service operators.

No shame for Rep. John Tierney

Tierney is engaged in a somewhat novel political strategy, his public declaration that, by having no knowledge of the illegal gambling venture of his brothers-in-law, he’s not all that sharp.

Health & Wellness

Study: Multivitamins lead to less cancer in older men

Millions of Americans take a daily multivitamin hoping it will help keep them healthy, and now a large clinical trial has shown that it actually works to prevent cancer -- at least in older men.
